page.title: 04EDUCATION at Longton schools
page.content: Every weekday morning I go to school with my friend. We usually walk but if it is wet or cold we go in our car. When we reach Wheelers shop (the Post Office) we sometimes go in and spend our pocket money.I spend about 10 pence. I buy a packet of three Gob-stoppers.Then we walk down School Lane and into the playground. We play football for about 5 minutes. The bell rings and we line up before we go inside. We go into our classroom, take off our coats and hang them up. Then we go to the Hall for assembly. Mr. Doran talks to us and we sing a hymn. We go back to our classrooms for lessons. A normal days lessons: {a.m.}English{ p.m.}Handwriting Maths History Religious Education Games
